subject: Football
lead_paragraph: When Ben Roethlisberger, Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback, chose to ride his motorcycle, he did not breach his football contract or break the law.   His biggest offense might have been breaking his contract with fans.
snippet: When Ben Roethlisberger, Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback, chose to ride his motorcycle, he did not breach his football contract or break the law.   His biggest offense might have been breaking his contract with fans.
